com.attivio.sdk.client

Interface SignalTrackingApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExposedApi

    public interface SignalTrackingApi
extends ExposedApi
    API for interacting tracking signals in the system.

      • getSignals

        CloseableIterable<Signal> getSignals(String modelName,
                                     Date startTime,
                                     Date endTime,
                                     Set<String> signalTypes)
        Get all signals currently being tracked
        Parameters:
        modelName - if not null, filter out signals not a part of this relevancy model
        startTime - if not null, filter out signals for queries made earlier than this
        endTime - if not null, filter out signals for queries made later than this
        signalType - if not null, filter out signals of this type
        Returns:
        signals

      • deleteSignals

            throws AttivioException
        Delete all signals for signalType.

        Throws:
        AttivioException
